ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"1") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"2") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"3") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"4") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"5") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"6") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"7") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"8") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"9") || CONTAINS( PNR_s__c,"0")
